### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23365](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23365) (index: Fix backwards search for bestblock by mzumsande)
* [#2312
commit fa6c9964860cd154cf40aff74dfa038aa6006de0 says to remove `sync_all` but you are removing `sync_blocks` as well
